resources.string: In this round you will try to get your team to guess the word on the screen by describing it using as many words as you like. \n\n You cannot say any part of the word, act, or say \"Rhymes with…\", \"Starts with…\", etc
In this round you will try to get your team to guess the word on the screen by describing it using only ONE word
In this round you will try to get your team to guess the word on the screen by acting only
